page.title: 19SPECULATION INN
page.content: The proprietors of the Speculation Inn are Mr and Mrs Nelson. The building has been in use as an inn for the past 125 years. Sold on the premises are beer, wine, spirits and snack foods. The inn can cater for about 80 customers. There is a part-time cleaner and bar-staff members are occasionally employed in addition to the Nelsons. The inn usually has about 50 customers a night, made up of both local people and tourists. The busiest time is in the summer 'tourist season', and the poorest month for business is January. For entertainment the inn provides background music, darts and card-games.
